body_html: Thanks for pointing this out! The root cause is related to the p_keep placeholder not having any shape information. By digging into this, we found that passing an unshaped tensor for the optional noise_shape argument also loses shape information. We're preparing a fix.
body_text: Thanks for pointing this out! The root cause is related to the p_keep placeholder not having any shape information. By digging into this, we found that passing an unshaped tensor for the optional noise_shape argument also loses shape information. We're preparing a fix.
body: Thanks for pointing this out! The root cause is related to the p_keep placeholder not having any shape information. By digging into this, we found that passing an unshaped tensor for the optional noise_shape argument also loses shape information. We're preparing a fix.
